name: Eggness Overloaded
description:
GET READY FOR SOME EGGNESS !!!!

Play as an Egg and collect all the color pallets in the map
Sounds easy huh?
IT ISNT !!

The pallets are hidden at places, and those which r visible, are hard to reach
this game has voice narration

DONT BREAK THE EGG

Special Thanks to ApolloTheGreat for the vocals
Meet the great
- https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtadAFs1tAHf7MQnaEovSIA

Controls
W - Forward
S - Backward
if u r still reading the controlls, then sorry u r a noob XD
A - Left
D - Right
Space - Jump

Play and rate :3
